messages.message:
Brian
WOw you have a lot of insight.  OMG
I love your icon!
Holy crap, you just took that away!  Nice job.  You are leveling up like me.
So many people post things hoping for a personal conversation.  You did it. 
I guess the most important thing I can ask a fellow genius is, what is your ambition?

Theists make me sick with their primitive worship. It's barbaric and it's holding us back as a species. I want to take away all control they have over society.
In the end game I want no religion at all. I don't want to force it on them. I want them to realize how stupid it is and walk away from it. It won't happen in my lifetime.

Brian
I agree completely. I am a theist and an atheist.
Sorry you can't be both, that's an oxymoron.

Brian
It Will happen in your Life and it starts Now.

No it require a paradigm shift in the culture mores of this country and many others. That happens generationally not overnight. The alternative is genocidal behavior based on religion which I find unacceptable.

Brian
I agree completely! It already happened though. The scales have been tipped Now it's just s matter of time.

Brian
Not sure what you are going for
